personality.question: When working on a project, you prefer to:

options.text: Work independently and set your own pace
Collaborate closely with team members
Lead the team and delegate tasks
Follow detailed instructions and guidelines
Analyze data and use logical reasoning
Brainstorm creative and innovative solutions
Seek input from others and build consensus
Make quick decisions based on intuition

personality.question: Your ideal work environment would be:

options.text: A quiet office where you can focus deeply
An open space with lots of interaction
A dynamic environment with changing challenges
A structured setting with clear procedures

personality.question: When learning new skills, you prefer to:

options.text: Read manuals and study theoretical concepts
Learn through hands-on practice and experimentation
Watch demonstrations and follow examples
Discuss concepts with mentors and peers

personality.question: Your approach to deadlines is typically:

options.text: Plan ahead and complete tasks early
Work steadily and finish on time
Work best under pressure near the deadline
Break large tasks into smaller, manageable pieces

personality.question: In meetings or group discussions, you usually:

options.text: Listen carefully and contribute thoughtful insights
Take charge and guide the conversation
Generate new ideas and creative solutions
Focus on practical implementation details

personality.question: When facing a complex challenge, you:

options.text: Break it down into logical, sequential steps
Look for patterns and underlying principles
Seek creative and unconventional approaches
Consult with experts and gather multiple perspectives

personality.question: Your communication style is best described as:

options.text: Direct and to-the-point
Detailed and comprehensive
Enthusiastic and engaging
Diplomatic and considerate

personality.question: When making important decisions, you rely most on:

options.text: Careful analysis of facts and data
Your intuition and gut feelings
Advice and input from trusted colleagues
Past experience and proven methods
Solving complex technical problems
Working with and helping people
Creating and innovating new solutions
Managing projects and leading teams

interests.question: How interested are you in designing and building technological solutions?

options.text: Very interested - I love creating tech solutions
Somewhat interested - I enjoy technical challenges
Moderately interested - It's okay but not my passion
Slightly interested - I prefer other activities
Not interested - Technology isn't appealing to me

interests.question: How interested are you in helping people with their health and medical needs?

options.text: Very interested - I'm passionate about healthcare
Somewhat interested - I like helping people heal
Moderately interested - It's meaningful work
Slightly interested - I prefer other ways to help
Not interested - Medical field doesn't appeal to me

interests.question: How interested are you in managing finances, investments, or business operations?

options.text: Very interested - I love business strategy and finance
Somewhat interested - Numbers and markets fascinate me
Moderately interested - It's practical and useful
Slightly interested - I prefer more creative work
Not interested - Business doesn't motivate me

interests.question: How interested are you in teaching, training, or developing others?

options.text: Very interested - I love sharing knowledge and mentoring
Somewhat interested - I enjoy helping others learn
Moderately interested - Teaching can be rewarding
Slightly interested - I prefer learning to teaching
Not interested - Education field doesn't suit me

interests.question: How interested are you in creative expression through art, design, or media?

options.text: Very interested - Creativity is my passion
Somewhat interested - I enjoy artistic pursuits
Moderately interested - Art is nice but not central
Slightly interested - I appreciate art but don't create
Not interested - Creative fields don't appeal to me

interests.question: How interested are you in conducting research and advancing scientific knowledge?

options.text: Very interested - I love discovery and research
Somewhat interested - Science fascinates me
Moderately interested - Research can be engaging
Slightly interested - I prefer applied over theoretical
Not interested - Research doesn't motivate me

interests.question: How interested are you in addressing social issues and helping communities?

options.text: Very interested - Social impact is my priority
Somewhat interested - I want to make a difference
Moderately interested - Helping others is important
Slightly interested - I prefer indirect ways to help
Not interested - Social work doesn't suit me

interests.question: How interested are you in legal systems, policy-making, or governance?

options.text: Very interested - Law and policy fascinate me
Somewhat interested - I like debate and justice
Moderately interested - Legal work seems important
Slightly interested - I prefer less formal structures
Not interested - Legal field doesn't appeal to me

skills.question: How would you rate your ability to analyze complex problems and break them down into manageable parts?

options.text: Expert - I excel at complex analysis and logical reasoning
Advanced - I'm very good at analytical thinking
Intermediate - I can handle moderate analytical tasks
Beginner - I'm developing my analytical skills
Novice - Analytical thinking is challenging for me

skills.question: How would you rate your ability to communicate ideas clearly and persuasively?

options.text: Expert - I'm an excellent communicator in all formats
Advanced - I communicate very effectively
Intermediate - I can communicate adequately
Beginner - I'm working on my communication skills
Novice - Communication is difficult for me

skills.question: How would you rate your ability to lead teams and inspire others?

options.text: Expert - I'm a natural leader who inspires others
Advanced - I lead effectively in most situations
Intermediate - I can lead when needed
Beginner - I'm developing leadership skills
Novice - Leadership doesn't come naturally to me

skills.question: How would you rate your technical and digital literacy skills?

options.text: Expert - I master new technologies quickly
Advanced - I'm very comfortable with technology
Intermediate - I can handle standard tech tasks
Beginner - I'm learning technical skills
Novice - Technology is challenging for me

skills.question: How would you rate your ability to generate innovative ideas and creative solutions?

options.text: Expert - I consistently generate innovative solutions
Advanced - I'm very creative and original
Intermediate - I can be creative when needed
Beginner - I'm developing my creative abilities
Novice - Creativity doesn't come easily to me

skills.question: How would you rate your ability to plan, organize, and execute projects?

options.text: Expert - I excel at managing complex projects
Advanced - I'm very good at project organization
Intermediate - I can manage standard projects
Beginner - I'm learning project management
Novice - Project management is challenging for me
